items.summary: Add the uploaded image file `brotherhood of copper banner.png` as a visible banner on the Home Page (`frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`), placed within the existing hero section so it appears above the hero title and scales responsively across mobile and desktop.
Add the uploaded banner image to the frontend as a static asset (do not serve it via the backend) and reference it from the Home Page using a stable path under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
